ItÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s 16 years after Snake PlisskenÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s rescue of the President of the United States of America in New York.
Now, a different President is in power, and declares the U.S. to be a land of moral superiority: no smoking, no red meat, no freedom of religion and no unapproved marriages.
A massive earthquake has hit Los Angeles, leaving it in ruins and completely surrounded by water. From this new island hell rises an army of discontent,

to the City of the Angels.
